titles.title: The veil is rent Lo Jesus stands Before

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: The veil is rent: Lo! Jesus stands Before the throne of grace; And clouds of incense from His hands Fill all that glorious place.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: His precious blood is sprinkled there, Before and on the throne; And His own wounds in heaven declare His work that saves is done.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: “‘Tis finished!” on the Cross He said, In agonies and blood; ‘Tis finished! now He lives to plead Before the face of God.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: ‘Tis finished! here our souls can rest, His work can never fail; By Him, our Sacrifice and Priest, We enter through the veil.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Within the holiest of all, Cleansed by His precious blood, Before Thy throne Thy children fall, And worship Thee, our God.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Boldly our heart and voice we raise, His Name, His blood, our plea; Assured our prayers and songs of praise Ascend by Him to Thee.
